summary: Applied 34 CSS style changes from browser preview to source files. Updated hero section (#section-hero) with height constraint (593px), adjusted image container alignment and heights, modified blur element positioning (left: 100px, top: 113px, width: 161px) with flex properties, reduced text container gap from 48px to 36px, added form height (64px), updated paths section with background color rgba(252, 241, 251, 1), box-shadow, border, removed padding, and changed text alignment to center, and updated super-app section with background color and centered text alignment.
current_status: All CSS changes from browser preview have been successfully applied to source files. Hero section, paths section, and super-app section have been updated with new styling. No linter errors detected. Changes are ready for testing.
